synopsis.text: The valiant King Inglis, who dedicated his life to his kingdom and subjects, yearns to further hone his knightly skills in his next life. His plea is granted by a divine entity, who reincarnates him into a distant future. However, there's a twist! He is reborn as an adorable young girl, hailing from a prestigious lineage of knights. Yet, at the tender age of six, she is deemed unfit to follow the path of knighthood. This captivating tale unfolds in a mini anime series adapted from a light novel, promising a unique blend of heroism, destiny, and a touch of the unexpected.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
